name: Codex
description: Allows highlighting WI entries in Chat, creating clickable maps, and more.

name: CSS Snippet Manager
description: Adds a UI to manage custom CSS snippets.

name: Custom Code Languages
description: Provides slash commands to add custom languages (syntax highlighting) to the codeblocks shown in chat messages.

name: Custom Title
description: Add slash command to set a custom title for the SillyTavern tab / window.

name: Home Link Button
description: When using the Discord Inspired Theme, click on the SillyTavern logo to go back to the landing page.

name: Favicon
description: Custom favicons.

name: Get ST App-Context
description: Access ST App context in STscripts. Open your browser's dev tools (F12) to see what data is available.

name: Group Expressions
description: Enable multiple expression sprites in Group Chats

name: Input History
description: Use Alt+Up or Alt+Down in the input box to go through your last inputs and /commands.

name: Landing Page
description: Customize the ST Landing page.

name: LALib
description: Library of helpful STScript commands for SillyTavern.

name: Message Actions
description: Execute Quick Replies on specific messages.

name: Message Interactivity
description: Adds some macros for interacting with messages when they are first rendered.

name: More Flexible Continues
description: More flexibility for continues.

name: Navigate Chat
description: Adds slash commands to help "replay" a chat.

name: Quick Branch Switch
description: Quickly switch between branches of a conversation.

name: Regex Slash
description: Use regular expressions to find-replace or test text with slash commands.

name: Trigger Cards
description: Displays small interactive portraits of all group chat members on top of the chat input bar.

name: Variable Viewer
description: Displays local and global variables in a window. Helpful while working on ST scripts.

name: Video Backgrounds
description: A slightly hacky way to use video backgrounds in SillyTavern.

name: Word Frequency
description: A nice graph of frequently occuring words in your chat so far.

name: WorldInfo Presets
description: Presets for multiple active WI books
